scripts.generate-event-bridge-schema-types: esbuild scripts/generate-event-bridge.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --format=cjs --outfile=openapi/generate-event-bridge-schema.cjs && node openapi/generate-event-bridge-schema.cjs && openapi-typescript openapi/event-bridge-schema.json -o openapi/event-bridge-schema-types.d.ts
scripts.generate-api-gw-api-types: esbuild scripts/generate.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --format=cjs --outfile=openapi/openapi.cjs && node openapi/openapi.cjs && openapi-typescript openapi/spec.json -o openapi/types.d.ts
scripts.generate-types: pnpm run generate-event-bridge-schema-types && pnpm run generate-api-gw-api-types
